text: janaru yāvudādarū saṅkaṭadalli silukikoṇḍa baḷika nāvu avarige anugrahada ruci uṇisidare, āgalē avaru nam'ma vacanagaḷa virud'dha yōjanegaḷannu rūpisalārambhisuttāre. Hēḷiri; yōjanegaḷa viṣayadalli allāhanu heccu kṣipranāgiddāne. Nam'ma dūtaru (malak‌gaḷu) nīvu māḍuttiruva ella yōjanegaḷannu dākhalisiḍuttiddāre
